Title: Home Alone 4: Taking Back the House
Writer: John Hughes (characters), Debra Frank, Steve L. Hayes
Actors: French Stewart, Erick Avari, Barbara Babcock, Jason Beghe
Plot: Amidst his parents' impending divorce, Kevin McCallister must foil his old nemesis Marv and his wife Vera's plot to kidnap a Crown Prince despite opposition from his dad Peter, Peter's fiancee Natalie, and Natalie's butler Mr. Prescott.
